content: crochet a beautiful and functional potholder that is full of texture introducing the suzi potholder which uses the suzette stitch a combination of the single_crochet and double_crochet stitch this is a double thick potholder that you can use safely in your kitchen it s crocheted in the round so there is no sewing involved which makes it a fun and quick make > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along > if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the 2024 crochet along email list ** here 2 ** > the free pattern for the suzi potholder can be found ** here 3 ** > the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** > you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** skill level advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet size this potholder measures approximately 8 x 8 but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder > materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 2 stitch markers or safety pins yardage * 165 yds / 151 m > yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/potholders-galore-crochet-along-2024 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/suzette-stitch-potholder/ 4 https //youtu be/iyijq_u-jgu 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
